alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 20 at 3:50AM MDT until April 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect from noon to 8 PM today for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, and 224 through 229, which includes the San Luis valley, the Sangre De Cristo and Wet Mountains, Fremont, Teller, El Paso, Pueblo and Huerfano counties... ...Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Thursday afternoon through evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 225, which includes the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo Mountains and the Wet Mountains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...222 AND 225... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221 and 222. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Timing...Noon until 8 PM today. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
